name: Grapefruit Kush
description: This cannabis strain is a cross of BC Kush and Grapefruit, Grapefruit Kush is one of the classic old-school Afghani Kush strains. Â Large buds with a fruity hash taste, produces enjoyable smooth and creamy smoke with a great high.
